name: mira
text: Is this a hole in the gutter, or is it a baby dinosaur puking through the gutter?

name: apocowarg
text: took me a minute to see that. kinda like one of those shitty magic eye posters that your friends swear has rocketship in it but all you're getting out of it is a headache and after a while you kind of think they're just fucking with you.

name: odei
text: Oh crap, I saw it. I hope I don't become paranoid about guttering now.

name: rowboat
text: I see nothing.

name: jollysaintpete
text: looking too hard

name: mantasmicdude
text: I see the baby from Eraserhead.

name: rowboat
text: You bawl like the baby in Eraserhead.

name: milkpants
text: Gawdzirra

name: pascal
text: Hilarious.

name: perhapsmaybe
text: wasn't this the first one with alt text? good times

name: cashprizes
text: speaking of alt text....

name: dovey
text: yes.

name: ph3r
text: No. Check 11/12/2001, although it being self-referential may have been added later.

name: mortshire
text: that is exactly how i feel right now.

name: chaesar
text: Poor Teodor, has to drag himself up to the roof to fix a busted drainpipe on Xmas day.

name: moraiat
text: Alt text: "snif"

name: joeyramoney
text: A comment left by joeyramoney was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, Zefiel, jdhenry105, rowboat, Moraiat, catgrl131, Sargasm, shoinan, choosebro, Audhumla, Lohninck)

name: rowboat
text: As a piece of art, it's very nice.  But, yeah - as a strip, not so much.  Whatever - the man was on vacation.

name: niklas
text: Getting a five for the first alt text. Start of a legend.

name: em2
text: amen

name: hyetal
text: Why is this only a 2.3?  They don't all have to be laugh-out-loud hilarity, people.  Sometimes it's important to have a distraction like this to remind us of that.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Relativity, doggie. When all of Achewood is so fucking great, even "pretty good" looks bad.

name: jesler729
text: It's a picture of a gutter.

name: odei
text: YEAH MAN FUCK PHOTOGRAPHY.

name: shoinan
text: No cussing!

name: bassguitarbill
text: Who's cussing?

name: especial
text: odei is cussing.

name: orcist
text: Is he cussing someone out?

name: utv
text: He's just cussing!

name: salvar
text: No cussing!

name: aaron_sorkin
text: Man, this is gonna be a HIT!

name: salvar
text: I don't even know what this is. Comparing it to "laugh-out-loud hilarity" would only be appropriate if I had some reason to believe this was intended to be humorous.

name: orvel
text: There is an alien spacecraft in the top right corner.

name: semiquaver
text: Aaaaaaaaaaand I'm done with the archives.  As a result, I'm rating this steamer a 5.  TRY AND STOP ME.  MWAHAHAHAHA!

name: milkpants
text: gawdzirra!

name: andyboy
text: Todd is spewing out of the drainhole. Merry xmas indeed.

name: hygraed
text: Someone tell me what the fuck I'm looking at here

name: sweetlips
text: This is the first strip with alt-text. The end.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i still dont see what everyone is seeing...

name: freewilliam
text: Yeah, where's that guy who does recaps for the blind when he'd actually be useful?
